Detailed Description

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this widget has been selected.

virtual void gaia::ui::IGalleryOnItemSelectedListener::onItemSelected ( gaia::ui::AbsListWidget *  pParent,
gaia::core::Widget *  pWidget,
int32_t  position,
int64_t  id 
) [pure virtual]

Callback method to be invoked when an item in this widget has been selected.

Parameters:
pParentThe provider where the selection happened
pWidgetThe widget within the provider that was clicked
positionThe position of the widget in the provider
idThe row id of the item that is selected
virtual void gaia::ui::IGalleryOnItemSelectedListener::onNothingSelected ( gaia::ui::AbsListWidget *  pParent) [pure virtual]

Callback method to be invoked when the selection disappears from this widget.

The selection can disappear for instance when touch is activated or when the provider becomes empty.

Parameters:
pParentThe provider that now contains no selected item.
